name: part_001
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブ】ねぽらぼみんなでアイドル衣装お披露目！【#ねぽらぼアイドル衣装】 [XxpA1P062Q0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: The members talk about their idol outfits, Nene's signature mishap, and their performance production.
Discussing Lamy's beautiful turn and the technical aspects of the stream.
Showing off the ribbons on the back of their outfits and the group's high energy.
Botan explains the 'air' elements of her outfit and mentions the SSRB mascot being burned.
The members congratulate Botan on reaching 1 million subscribers.
Detailed look at their leg/sock designs and the placement of their leg ribbons.
Discussing the arm ribbons and the ribbons decorating Botan's ears.
Final remarks on Botan's 'loli' appearance and concluding with a restless, fun celebration.

subtitles.original: ししろ先輩！ねぇねぇ！
subtitles.english: Shishiro-senpai! Hey, hey!

subtitles.original: ほら！君あんなに「アイドル衣装が～」とかって昨日配信してたのに、これでもう...
subtitles.english: Look! You were streaming yesterday like "Idol outfits are...", and now already...

subtitles.original: もうはやだよ！あ、でもね、本当にね、あのほら...
subtitles.english: It's already over! Ah, but really, you know, like...

subtitles.original: お披露目の、あのサイン書くやつ！
subtitles.english: The reveal, that part where we wrote our signatures!

subtitles.original: え、すごかったよね！画面に書いてたんでしょ？
subtitles.english: Eh, it was amazing, wasn't it! You were writing on the screen, right?

subtitles.original: とってもね、ねねがね、自分に...
subtitles.english: Very much, Nene, for herself...

subtitles.original: あの都合のいい向きで書いてたからね、みんなには...
subtitles.english: She wrote it in a direction convenient for her, so for everyone...

subtitles.original: 逆向きで見えてたっていうハプニングね！
subtitles.english: it appeared backwards - what a mishap!

subtitles.original: 結構さ、今日何やるかってさ、お互い言わなかったじゃん？
subtitles.english: Actually, we didn't tell each other what we were doing today, did we?

subtitles.original: あ、そうだね！
subtitles.english: Ah, that's right!

subtitles.original: だから、さっき、えっ！
subtitles.english: So, just now, I was like "Eh!"

subtitles.original: え、でもいっぱい出しちゃったけど...
subtitles.english: Eh, but we put out so much...

subtitles.original: え、でもそれはそれで、なんか味があるっていうか...
subtitles.english: Eh, but that has its own charm, or rather...

subtitles.original: 私たちらしくて良かった！あ、すごい良かった！
subtitles.english: It was very "us", which was good! Ah, it was great!

subtitles.original: まあ良かった。いいなと思った。なんかすごい演出が斬新だった。そうだね。
subtitles.english: Well, it was good. I liked it. The production was really novel. True.

subtitles.original: ね、初めてのことながら。
subtitles.english: Yeah, for a first time.

subtitles.original: いや～、揃ったね！揃った！
subtitles.english: Wow, we're all together! Together!

subtitles.original: ね、あとおまるんのね、ねねを最初に...
subtitles.english: Yeah, and Omarun, Nene at the start...

subtitles.original: あの、倒して... あ、そうだわ！
subtitles.english: um, taking her down... Ah, that's right!

subtitles.original: あの、ファンタジーゲームね！そう、ファンタジーゲーム始まりました。
subtitles.english: That fantasy game! Yeah, the fantasy game began.

subtitles.original: ポルカ先輩っていうのが良かったね。
subtitles.english: That "Polka-senpai" bit was good.

subtitles.original: でもファンタジーゲームのナレーションやってる人かと思ったわ、私。
subtitles.english: But I thought it was someone doing narration for a fantasy game.

subtitles.original: ゲーム始まっちゃうよ！
subtitles.english: The game's starting!

subtitles.original: 今回もご協力いただきありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you for your cooperation this time as well.

subtitles.original: 目覚めたらアイドルだったね、ね。そう、目覚めたら、ここはステージっていうのがね。
subtitles.english: When I woke up, I was an idol, right? Yeah, "When I woke up, this was the stage."

subtitles.original: アイドルだから毒リンゴ効かんかったわ、っていうやつでしょ？
subtitles.english: Since I'm an idol, the poison apple didn't work - that's the one, right?

subtitles.original: そうそう。でも、VTuberだから毒リンゴは効かないですよね（笑）みたいな。
subtitles.english: Right, right. But like, "Since I'm a VTuber, poison apples don't work, right? (laughs)".

subtitles.original: 確かに効かないね。
subtitles.english: True, they don't work.

subtitles.original: へ～。そっか。
subtitles.english: Heh~. I see.

subtitles.original: 何？「へ～」じゃないんだわ。何これ。
subtitles.english: What? Don't just say "Heh~". What is this?

subtitles.original: ラミィがさ、なんか、あの着替えたのめちゃくちゃさ、綺麗だったね、ターン。ね、ターン！
subtitles.english: Lamy, that part where she changed, her turn was incredibly beautiful. Yeah, the turn!

subtitles.original: ひゅん！って. これこれこれこれ！
subtitles.english: Hyun! This, this, this, this!

subtitles.original: また謎技術が使われてたわ。
subtitles.english: Yet another mysterious technology was used.

subtitles.original: いや、後ろのリボン本当可愛い！可愛い！見て、後ろ見て！
subtitles.english: The ribbon on the back is truly cute! Cute! Look, look at the back!

subtitles.original: あ、後ろ見てもらおう。
subtitles.english: Ah, let's show the back.

subtitles.original: ほら、みんな、みんな後ろ向いてほら！
subtitles.english: Look, everyone, everyone turn around!

subtitles.original: じゃ～ん！ポルカとラミィのが逆になってんの。
subtitles.english: Ta-da! Polka and Lamy's are reversed.

subtitles.original: そう、色反転してんの。
subtitles.english: Yeah, the colors are inverted.

subtitles.original: そうでよ。
subtitles.english: That's right.

subtitles.original: ちょ、もうちょっと引きで、引きで撮ってください。引きで！
subtitles.english: Wait, please take a wider shot. Wide shot!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！自分でそれを言うのめちゃくちゃ面白い。
subtitles.english: Yay! It's so funny saying that ourselves.

subtitles.original: さあ、今日みんなテンション高いな。高い。いや、そりゃそうでしょ！
subtitles.english: Boy, everyone's energy is high today. High. Well, of course it is!

subtitles.original: そうだよ。高いです。
subtitles.english: Exactly. It is high.

subtitles.original: まずいな。でね、あと最後のししろんだよ。ありがとな。
subtitles.english: Uh oh. And then, there's Shishiron at the end. Thanks.

subtitles.original: 最高だったよね！もう、うん、もうちょっとなんかね... 羽ばたいちゃった。
subtitles.english: It was the best! Like, yeah, a little bit... I kind of took flight.

subtitles.original: 羽ばたいちゃった。でも空気！あれ空気だよね？
subtitles.english: Took flight. But the air! That was air, right?

subtitles.original: 空気！すごかった！
subtitles.english: Air! It was amazing!

subtitles.original: マシュマロが中に入った空気、ちゃんと...
subtitles.english: Air that had marshmallows inside, properly...

subtitles.original: ちゃんと作りました！ふわふわ、ちゃんと自分で作りました。
subtitles.english: I made it properly! It's fluffy, I made it myself.

subtitles.original: いや本当にすごかった！めっちゃ可愛かった。
subtitles.english: No, it was really incredible! So cute.

subtitles.original: SSRBまさか焼かれると思わなかった。
subtitles.english: I never thought SSRB would get burned.

subtitles.original: 思わなかった。でもいつも投げられたり、投げられたり...
subtitles.english: Me neither. But they're always being thrown, thrown...

subtitles.original: 爆発してんのに、さらに焼かれるんだ、っていう。
subtitles.english: They're already exploding, and now they're getting burned too.

subtitles.original: あ、俺が焼かれ続けて。それでさ、100万人記念おめでとうございます！おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll just keep being burned. Also, congratulations on 1 million subscribers! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: あれ、全然知らなかったから、そうなんですよ。
subtitles.english: That, I didn't know about it at all, so yeah.

subtitles.original: え、超良いじゃん！と思って。まあ良かった。ぜひ後でチェックしてください。はーい！そっちも大チェック！
subtitles.english: Eh, I thought it was super cool. Well, it was good. Please check it out later. Okay! Check that out too!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、どうする？え、何がどうするの？
subtitles.english: So, what should we do? Eh, what do you mean what should we do?

subtitles.original: あとね、見て見て、ねねさ、オレンジかと思いきやピンクなの、ちょっと。あ、アピール入りました。
subtitles.english: And look, look, Nene's... I thought it was orange but it's actually pink. Ah, she's showing off.

subtitles.original: ねねのこの色って何色になるの？
subtitles.english: What color would you call this of Nene's?

subtitles.original: 結構、ほら見て、足！足！そういえばみんな足も...
subtitles.english: Quite... look, look, legs! Legs! Come to think of it, everyone's legs too...

subtitles.original: 足もほら！私の足ほら！いつもの。ほら良いよね、それ。
subtitles.english: Legs too, look! Look at my legs! The usual. Look, that's good.

subtitles.original: 私はトランプの柄。
subtitles.english: I have a playing card pattern.

subtitles.original: ねねはね、桃の花と桃。
subtitles.english: Nene has peach blossoms and peaches.

subtitles.original: いいね、みんな結構、ほら、みんならしい感じで。違うんだよ。
subtitles.english: Nice, everyone's got their own style. They're all different.

subtitles.original: あ、で、服によって、こっちにさ、ついてるのも違うよね、確か。
subtitles.english: Ah, and depending on the outfit, the side this is on is different too, I think.

subtitles.original: 私こっち。ラミィちゃんと一緒？
subtitles.english: Mine's here. Same as Lamy-chan?

subtitles.original: そうそうそう。ラミィと一緒。
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, yes. Same as Lamy.

subtitles.original: へ～、そうなんだ。おお、本当だ。ね、うちらこっちだもんね。一緒、一緒。
subtitles.english: Heh~, I see. Oh, you're right. Yeah, ours is on this side. Same, same.

subtitles.original: え、そこの太もものそこだけついてるの、ヤバいな。ちょ。
subtitles.english: Eh, it's crazy how it's only attached to that part of the thigh. Wait.

subtitles.original: いいじゃん、いいじゃん！特別に、ちょっと見ていいよ、ほら。ラミィ、ラミィ、ラミィ！
subtitles.english: It's fine, it's fine! I'll let you take a special look, here. Lamy, Lamy, Lamy!

subtitles.original: え、ちょっと何、何？
subtitles.english: Eh, wait, what, what?

subtitles.original: ねねも、ねね！ちょ、違うんだよな、それ。
subtitles.english: Nene too, Nene! Wait, that's not right.

subtitles.original: 何それ、ロデオしてんの、な。
subtitles.english: What is that, are you doing a rodeo?

subtitles.original: これ絶対違うだろ、それは。
subtitles.english: That's definitely wrong.

subtitles.original: あ、腕についてるのもいいな、ししろん。
subtitles.english: Ah, the one on the arm is nice too, Shishiron.

subtitles.original: 腕は先輩みんなついてるんじゃないかな。
subtitles.english: I think all the senpais have it on their arms.

subtitles.original: あ、お揃いじゃないか、これ。
subtitles.english: Ah, isn't this matching?

subtitles.original: でね、耳がね、あれなんだよね。リボン！リボン！めっちゃ可愛い！そう、耳。
subtitles.english: And the ears, you know. Ribbon! Ribbon! So cute! Yeah, the ears.

subtitles.original: え、耳、ぴこぴこ。ぴこぴこもだけどさ、このリボンがええやんな。
subtitles.english: Eh, ears, twitching. The twitching is one thing, but this ribbon is great, isn't it.

subtitles.original: そうなの。ね、ネックレスにもお揃いで。いいな。
subtitles.english: That's right. And there's a matching one on the necklace. Nice.

subtitles.original: あ、ていうかさ、なんか、そうやって見るとししろ本当にロリだな、やっぱり。嘘やん。
subtitles.english: Ah, come to think of it, seeing you like that, Shishiro really is a loli after all. No way.

subtitles.original: 結構、Twitterとか見てても、ロリっていう... いつもほら、かっこいいからさ、衣装が。
subtitles.english: Quite a lot on Twitter, the "loli" thing... Because usually, you see, her outfits are cool.

subtitles.original: だから、今日このアイドル衣装を着た感じ、どんな感じになるのかすごい楽しみにしてるリスナーさんいっぱいいたけど。
subtitles.english: So, there were lots of listeners really looking forward to seeing how she'd look in this idol outfit today.

subtitles.original: みんな、どうだったかな。ね、どうですか。感想またちょっとね、#ねぽらぼアイドル衣装 で、呟いてほしい。どうしたの？
subtitles.english: Everyone, how was it? Well, what do you think? I want you to tweet your impressions with #NepolaboIdolOutfit. What happened?

subtitles.original: どうしたの？もうなんか、集中切れちゃった？
subtitles.english: What's wrong? Did you lose your concentration already?

subtitles.original: 集中切れちゃったのかな。さ、みんな、ちょっと、みんな今日ちょっと落ち着きない。
subtitles.english: Maybe she lost her concentration. Now, everyone, a bit... everyone's a bit restless today.

subtitles.original: だって嬉しいんだもん。着れてさ。イエーイ！
subtitles.english: But we're happy. To be able to wear this. Yay!

subtitles.original: フラメンコ！やめなさい、やめなさい。はあ、あっち。
subtitles.english: Flamenco! Stop it, stop it. Phew, look over there.
